author: Francisco-Gamino
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- Ported Invoke-RestMethod and Invoke-WebRequest to PowerShell repo, using CoreCLR refactoring guidance for CoreCLR, FullCLR, and common code. For CoreCLR, the code is written using the httpclient APIs.
- Added new file structure for CoreCLR and FullCLR files for the webcmdlets source code.
- Made Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet work on CoreCLR without mshtml.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
  Yes
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
  No tests are being added in this checkin. This is my next work item.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->
